author: The Hated One
description:
Join my Patreon or Zuck will know your location: https://www.patreon.com/thehatedone 

WhatsApp is now officially running targeted ads. And I am urging you to leave it before it gets worse. Because it will go downhill from here very fast. 

When he first bought WhatsApp for $22 billion, he promised that the app would never run ads. That was a lie. A lie that took years to manifest, but it’s finally here. But the lie doesn’t just end there. Zuckerberg is still lying directly in the statement about how they will be running ads inside WhatsApp. These are supposed to be “ads built with privacy in mind”. No, they are not. For now, the ads will be targeted based on your country, city, language, your channels and ad interactions.

Which on its own is a uniquely profiled set of data. But this is a boiling the frog moment. Because everything inside WhatsApp is prepared to take that next step further when quarterly earnings call for it. All the technology to use your WhatsApp data, including yo
title: DELETE WHATSAPP ALREADY!!!
